history.proof: intros. unfold Decidable.decidable in H. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
E: R -> Prop

Goal:
Decidable.decidable (exists x : R, E x) -> {exists x : R, E x} + {forall x : R, ~ E x}

Premises:
Decidable.decidable = fun P : Prop => P \/ ~ P : Prop -> Prop Argument scope is [type_scope]
Module Decidable := Struct Definition decidable : Prop -> Prop. Parameter dec_not_not : forall P : Prop, decidable P -> (~ P -> False) -> P. Parameter dec_True : decidable True. Parameter dec_False : decidable False. Parameter dec_or : forall A B : Prop, decidable A -> decidable B -> decidable (A \/ B). Parameter dec_and : forall A B : Prop, decidable A -> decidable B -> decidable (A /\ B). Parameter dec_not : forall A : Prop, decidable A -> decidable (~ A). Parameter dec_imp : forall A B : Prop, decidable A -> decidable B -> decidable (A -> B). Parameter dec_iff : forall A B : Prop, decidable A -> decidable B -> decidable (A <-> B). Parameter not_not : forall P : Prop, decidable P -> ~ ~ P -> P. Parameter not_or : forall A B : Prop, ~ (A \/ B) -> ~ A /\ ~ B. Parameter not_and : forall A B : Prop, decidable A -> ~ (A /\
*** [ R : Set ]
completeness : forall E : R -> Prop, bound E -> (exists x : R, E x) -> {m : R | is_lub E m}
Empty_correct_1 : forall E : R -> Prop, Empty E -> forall x : R, ~ E x
Empty = fun E : R -> Prop => Lub_Rbar (fun x : R => x = 0 \/ E x) = Glb_Rbar (fun x : R => x = 0 \/ E x) /\ Lub_Rbar (fun x : R => x = 1 \/ E x) = Glb_Rbar (fun x : R => x = 1 \/ E x) : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scope is [function_scope]
is_upper_bound = fun (E : R -> Prop) (m : R) => forall x : R, E x -> x <= m : (R -> Prop) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope]
is_lb_Rbar = fun (E : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar) => forall x : R, E x -> Rbar_le l x : (R -> Prop) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
is_ub_Rbar = fun (E : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar) => forall x : R, E x -> Rbar_le x l : (R -> Prop) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
is_lub = fun (E : R -> Prop) (m : R) => is_upper_bound E m /\ (forall b : R, is_upper_bound E b -> m <= b) : (R -> Prop) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope]
List.neg_Forall_Exists_neg : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> ~ List.Forall P l -> List.Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l
List.Forall_Exists_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall l : list A, {List.Forall P l} + {List.Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l}
Record almost_ring_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_art { ARadd_0_l : forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x; ARadd_comm : forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x); ARadd_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z); ARmul_1_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x; ARmul_0_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rO x) rO; ARmul_comm : forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x); ARmul_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z); ARdistr_l : forall x y z :...
Record ring_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_rt { Radd_0_l : forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x; Radd_comm : forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x); Radd_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z); Rmul_1_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x; Rmul_comm : forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x); Rmul_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z); Rdistr_l : forall x y z : R, req (rmul (radd x y) z) (radd (rmul x z) (...

ex_lub_Rbar : forall E : R -> Prop, {l : Rbar | is_lub_Rbar E l}

Record SORaddon (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cplus ctimes cminus : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb cleb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R) (E : Type) (pow_phi : N -> E) (rpow : R -> E -> R) : Prop := mk_SOR_addon { SORrm : ring_morph rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req cO cI cplus ctimes cminus copp ceqb phi; SORpower : power_theory rI rtimes req pow_phi rpow; SORcneqb_morph : forall x y : C, ceqb x y = false -> ~ req (phi x) (phi y); SORcleb_morph : forall x y : C, cleb x y = true -> r...
List.Exists_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> {List.Exists P l} + {~ List.Exists P l}
List.Forall_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall l : list A, {List.Forall P l} + {~ List.Forall P l}
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
Znumtheory.prime_dec_aux : forall p m : Z, {forall n : Z, (1 < n < m)%Z -> Znumtheory.rel_prime n p} + {exists n : Z, (1 < n < m)%Z /\ ~ Znumtheory.rel_prime n p}
is_lub_Rbar = fun (E : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar) => is_ub_Rbar E l /\ (forall b : Rbar, is_ub_Rbar E b -> Rbar_le l b) : (R -> Prop) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
is_glb_Rbar = fun (E : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar) => is_lb_Rbar E l /\ (forall b : Rbar, is_lb_Rbar E b -> Rbar_le b l) : (R -> Prop) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]

RingMicromega.cneqb_sound : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cplus ctimes cminus : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb cleb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R) (E : Type) (pow_phi : N -> E) (rpow : R -> E -> R), RingMicromega.SORaddon rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle cO cI cplus ctimes cminus copp ceqb cleb phi pow_phi rpow -> forall x y : C, RingMicromega.cneqb ceqb x y = true -> ~ req (phi x) (phi y)
ARmul_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)
ARmul_0_r : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (rmul x rO) rO
RingMicromega.SORcleb_morph : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cplus ctimes cminus : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb cleb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R) (E : Type) (pow_phi : N -> E) (rpow : R -> E -> R), RingMicromega.SORaddon rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle cO cI cplus ctimes cminus copp ceqb cleb phi pow_phi rpow -> forall x y : C, cleb x y = true -> rle (phi x) (phi y)
Record ring_morph (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R) : Prop := mkmorph { morph0 : req (phi cO) rO; morph1 : req (phi cI) rI; morph_add : forall x y : C, req (phi (cadd x y)) (radd (phi x) (phi y)); morph_sub : forall x y : C, req (phi (csub x y)) (rsub (phi x) (phi y)); morph_mul : forall x y : C, req (phi (cmul x y)) (rmul (phi x) (phi y)); morph_opp : forall x : C, req (phi (copp x)) (ropp (phi x...
List.Exists_Forall_neg : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, P x \/ ~ P x) -> List.Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l < -> ~ List.Forall P l
Glb_Rbar = fun E : R -> Prop => proj1_sig (ex_glb_Rbar E) : (R -> Prop) -> Rbar Argument scope is [function_scope]
Lub_Rbar = fun E : R -> Prop => proj1_sig (ex_lub_Rbar E) : (R -> Prop) -> Rbar Argument scope is [function_scope]
Record SOR (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_SOR_theory { SORsetoid : Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req; SORplus_wd : forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> req (rplus x1 y1) (rplus x2 y2); SORtimes_wd : forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> req (rtimes x1 y1) (rtimes x2 y2); SORopp_wd : forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> req (ropp x1) (ropp x2); SORle_wd : forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2...
proj1_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> A
Inductive sig (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : Type := exist : forall x : A, P x -> {x : A | P x} For sig: Argument A is implicit For exist: Argument A is implicit For sig: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope] For exist: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ _]
OrderedRing.Rneq_symm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, ~ req n m -> ~ req m n
OrderedRing.SORlt_wd : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> rlt x1 y1 < -> rlt x2 y2
OrderedRing.SORplus_wd : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> req (rplus x1 y1) (rplus x2 y2)
SetoidList.InA_dec : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, {eqA x y} + {~ eqA x y}) -> forall (x : A) (l : list A), {SetoidList.InA eqA x l} + {~ SetoidList.InA eqA x l}
ropp_neq_0 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall r : R, ~ req (ropp rI) rO -> ~ req r rO -> ~ req (ropp r) rO
OrderedRing.Rlt_neq : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, rlt n m -> ~ req n m

```coq
intros E H.
unfold Decidable.decidable in H.
destruct H as [Htrue | Hfalse].
- left. apply Htrue.
- right. intros x. apply Decidable.dec_not_not in Hfalse. apply Hfalse.
Qed.```

original: intros E H. unfold Decidable.decidable in H. destruct H as [Htrue | Hfalse]. - left. apply Htrue. - right. intros x. apply Decidable.dec_not_not in Hfalse. apply Hfalse.
